tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, başka planlar yaparken başımıza gelenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: John Lennon

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişin seni geriye çekmesine izin verme; güzel şeyleri kaçırırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru olanı yaparken, ahlaki hislerinizin yolunuza çıkmasına hiçbir zaman izin vermeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

tr_quotes.quote: Uçurtmalar rüzgâr gücüyle değil, o güce karşı koydukları için yükselir.
tr_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşam sanatı, bırakmanın ve elinde tutmanın güzel karışımında gizlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğini düşünmek, yapabilme gücünü yaratır.
tr_quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

tr_quotes.quote: Şiddet göstermeden güçlü, zayıflık göstermeden yumuşak ol.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmak istersen söz ustası ol. Dil yiğit elindeki kılıç gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Mısır Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü ol! Bırak nasıl hala gülümseyebildiğini merak etsinler.
tr_quotes.author: Che Guevera

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü ol! Yoksa büyümek için hep başkalarını kullanmak zorundasın.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Hayata karşı güçlü olmak demek, bazen umursamaz olmayı bilmek demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Özgür Bacaksız

tr_quotes.quote: Olduğun kişi olarak sevilmemek, olmadığın biri gibi davranarak sevilmekten daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer en zayıf noktanız insanlara dostluk göstermenizse, siz dünyanın en güçlü insanısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes boyla, posla, yopla, tüfekle güçlü olurken sen hak ile adalet ile güçlü ol!
tr_quotes.author: Turan Dursun

tr_quotes.quote: Gitme diyebilecek kadar güçlü olmalı insan. Çünkü hiç kimse kaybettiklerini unutabilecek kadar güçlü değil.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin hayal gücüyle düşlerinin gerçekleşmesi arasındaki mesafe yalnızca onun yoğun isteğiyle aşılabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu olduğum için değil, güçlü olduğum için gülüyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Ts Eliot

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmalısınız, kendi gücünüze inanmalı ama gerçekten güçlü olmak için çabalamalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Duygu Asena

tr_quotes.quote: Zorluklardan geçip teslim olmamaya karar verdiğinizde, bu güçtür.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Tek ödevin kendin olmaktır. Güçlü ol yoksa büyümek için hep başkalarını kullanmak zorunda kalırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü ol ama kaba değil. İyi ol ama zayıf değil. Alçakgönüllü ol ama çekingen değil. Gururlu ol ama kibirli değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece anne olduğunuz için, her gün mutlu olmak zorunda değilsiniz. Ama her gün güçlü olmak zorundasınız.
tr_quotes.author: Üstün Dökmen

tr_quotes.quote: Hazır olmak güçlü olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmak öğrenilen bir çabaydı.
tr_quotes.author: Azra Kohen

tr_quotes.quote: Yumuşak kalpli olmak güçlü olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün canını yakan, yarın seni güçlü yapacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlükler başarının değerini artıran süslerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Moliére

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünmeye zaman ayırın. Güçlü olmanın kaynağı budur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü ol! Başarılı olmak için gereken tüm özelliklere sahipsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan güçlü olmadığı zaman akıllı olmak zorundadır.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Zola

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmak için, en iyisi olmak gerekir, başka çare yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer gerçekten güçlü olmak istiyorsan tek başına savaşmayı öğrenmelisin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmak zorunda olunmalı, yoksa asla güçlü olunmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Evet, çoğunluk güçlüdür ama haklı olmak için güçlü olmak yeter mi?
tr_quotes.author: Cemil Meriç

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, dünyayı değiştirmek için kullanabileceğiniz en güçlü silahtır.
tr_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kadın güçlü olmayı seçmez aslında sadece güçlü olmak zorunda bırakılır.
tr_quotes.author: Cem Aksu

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer en zayıf noktanız insanlara dostluk göstermenizse, siz dünyanın en güçlü insanısınız
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: Yeterince sevginiz varsa dünyadaki en mutlu ve en güçlü insan olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Dr. Emmet Fox

tr_quotes.quote: Engeller beni durduramaz her bir engel kararlılığımı daha da güçlendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen güçlü olabilmek için önce zayıf olmak, acı çekmek gerekebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Gülseren Budayıcıoğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç bir dil özlemi taşıyacak kadar güçlü değildir. İnsan bu yüzden özledikçe sessizleşir.
tr_quotes.author: Elif Şafak

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmak için kendi alanında en iyi olmak zorundadır insan, başka çare yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Tek seçeneğiniz güçlü olmak olana kadar, ne kadar güçlü olduğunuzu asla bilemezsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Marley

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes boyla, posla, yopla, tüfekle güçlü olurken sen hak ile adalet ile güçlü ol!
tr_quotes.author: Turan Dursun

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kalbi ağırlaştıkça onu taşıyabilmek için çok daha güçlü olmak zorunda.
tr_quotes.author: Alexandra Bracken

tr_quotes.quote: Hayata karşı güçlü olmak demek, bazen umursamaz olmayı bilmek demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Özgür Bacaksız

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan denen yaratık, korktuğu için güçlü olmak ister; onun eski bir özelliğidir bu.
tr_quotes.author: Meşa Selimoviç

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlü olmalısınız, kendi gücünüze inanmalı ama gerçekten güçlü olmak için çabalamalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Duygu Asena

tr_quotes.quote: Acıya dayanacak kadar güçlü olabilirim, ama bu benim bunu hak ettiğim anlamına gelmez.
tr_quotes.author: Tom Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Soylu olmak için değil, güçlü olmak için değil, kendimiz olmak için saf, temiz olalım.
tr_quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

en_quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
en_quotes.author: Susan Gale

en_quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: When written in Chinese the word “crisis” is composed of two characters – one represents danger and the other represents opportunity.
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, “I will try again tomorrow.”
en_quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

en_quotes.quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that’s what makes you strong.
en_quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

en_quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
en_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

en_quotes.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent in doing nothing.
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Courage isn’t having the strength to go on – it is going on when you don’t have strength.
en_quotes.author: Napoléon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: You can't really be strong until you can see a funny side to things.
en_quotes.author: Ken Kesey

en_quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
The greatest test of courage on the earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
en_quotes.author: R. G. Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
en_quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Life is very interesting. In the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
en_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

en_quotes.quote: Stress is caused by being ‘here' but wanting to be ‘there.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes our light goes out, but is blown again into instant flame by an encounter with another human being.
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
en_quotes.author: Robert Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success one step beyond their greatest failure.
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it’s always your choice.
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I’ll show you someone who has overcome adversity.
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: The more one judges, the less one loves
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
en_quotes.author: Oprah

en_quotes.quote: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Strength is the ability to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands – and then eat just one of those pieces.
en_quotes.author: Judith Viorst

en_quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Don’t brood. Get on with living and loving. You don’t have forever.
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Man can live about forty days without food, about three days without water, about eight minutes without air, but only for one second without hope.
en_quotes.author: Hal Lindsey

en_quotes.quote: Most of us, swimming against the tides of trouble the world knows nothing about, need only a bit of praise or encouragement – and we will make the goal.
en_quotes.author: Jerome Fleishman

en_quotes.quote: If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again.
en_quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

en_quotes.quote: Inside of a ring or out, ain’t nothing wrong with going down. It’s staying down that’s wrong.
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
en_quotes.author: Richard Branson

en_quotes.quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven’t.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

en_quotes.quote: It is a common experience that a problem difficult at night is resolved in the morning after the committee of sleep has worked on it.
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
en_quotes.author: Susan Gale

en_quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: When written in Chinese the word “crisis” is composed of two characters – one represents danger and the other represents opportunity.
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that’s what makes you strong.
en_quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

en_quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
en_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

en_quotes.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent in doing nothing.
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Courage isn’t having the strength to go on – it is going on when you don’t have strength.
en_quotes.author: Napoléon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: You can't really be strong until you can see a funny side to things.
en_quotes.author: Ken Kesey

en_quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
The greatest test of courage on the earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
en_quotes.author: R. G. Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
en_quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: Concentration is the secret of strength.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Life is very interesting. In the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
en_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

en_quotes.quote: Stress is caused by being ‘here' but wanting to be ‘there.'
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes our light goes out, but is blown again into instant flame by an encounter with another human being.
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success one step beyond their greatest failure.
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: You Were Given This Life Because You Are Strong Enough To Live It.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Strength is a matter of a made up mind.
en_quotes.author: John Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Normalize being a little crazy for what you believe in.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
en_quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

en_quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Fools give up fast. Strong men persevere. The wise keep going forever.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: There are two ways of exerting one’s strength: one is pushing down, the other is pulling up.
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: If you haven’t the strength to impose your own terms upon life, then you must accept the terms it offers you.
en_quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
en_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
en_quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

en_quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life. Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: There’s nothing that cleanses your soul like getting the hell kicked out of you.
en_quotes.author: Woody Hayes

en_quotes.quote: You will never do anything in the world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Courage isn’t having the strength to go on, it is going on when you don’t have the strength.
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
en_quotes.author: Peter Marshall

en_quotes.quote: To have become a deeper man is the privilege of those who have suffered.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Yielding will overcome anything superior to itself; its strength is boundless.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
en_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

en_quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Kites rise highest against the wind – not with it.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Continuous effort – not strength or intelligence – is the key to unlocking our potential.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want.
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Failure gave me strength. Pain was my motivation.
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
en_quotes.author: Japanese proverb

en_quotes.quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection.
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: In the middle of a difficulty lies opportunity.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven’t.
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

en_quotes.quote: Where is the man who has the strength to be true, and to show himself as he is?
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Don’t give up the fight. Stand up for your rights.
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy.
en_quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

en_quotes.quote: Better to fight and fall than to live without hope.
en_quotes.author: Volsunga

en_quotes.quote: People do not lack strength, they lack will.
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Strength doesn’t come from winning.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: If you have no struggles, you’ll have no strength.
en_quotes.author: Tim Fargo

en_quotes.quote: Growth is overrated. Endurance is underrated.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: I realized that my strength was being different.
en_quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Problems are messages.
en_quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

en_quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
You are never given anything in this world that you can’t handle.
Falling down is an accident. Staying down is a choice.
What you allow is what will continue.
The only thing that can stop me, is me.
Remember, when you forgive, you heal. And when you let go, you grow.
You are the only you there is and ever will be.
en_quotes.author: Jen Sincero

en_quotes.quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
en_quotes.author: Japanese proverb

en_quotes.quote: Heroism is endurance for one moment more.
en_quotes.author: George F. Kennan

en_quotes.quote: Problems are the price you pay for progress.
en_quotes.author: Branch Rickey

en_quotes.quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
en_quotes.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

en_quotes.quote: Strength of mind is exercise, not rest.
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: This too shall pass away.
en_quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

en_quotes.quote: I’ve never met a strong person with an easy past.
en_quotes.author: Atticus

en_quotes.quote: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
en_quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

en_quotes.quote: Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven’t half the strength you think they have.
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: Leverage the strength that you have: that no one else can be you.
en_quotes.author: Todd Wheatland

en_quotes.quote: Life is very interesting. In the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.
en_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: In times of crisis, people reach for meaning. Meaning is strength. Our survival may depend on our seeking and finding it.
en_quotes.author: Dawna Markova

en_quotes.quote: I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.
en_quotes.author: Joshua Graham

en_quotes.quote: You have been chosen, and you must therefore use such strength and heart and wits as you have.
en_quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

en_quotes.quote: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us, but those who win battles we know nothing about.
Be gentle with yourself. You’re doing the best you can.
Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
Perhaps I am stronger than I think.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: Smiles can hide so much; fear, pain, sadness, tears. But than again they reflect one thing: strength.
The task ahead of you is never greater than the strength within you.
In the mountains of truth you will never climb in vain; either you will get up higher today or you will exercise your strength so as to be able to get up higher tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
en_quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

en_quotes.quote: The man who has done his best has done everything.
en_quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

en_quotes.quote: It’s not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit.
en_quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
